title: W3C Manifest support
body: Add support for the new W3C manifest specification for pinned apps as well as for Windows store applications.

comments.body: This and other PWA features can save the Windows Mobile platform. Keep the work up. Thanks.
Hey microsoft, don't miss the boat!
I'd love this as I love to develop web apps
This is a great opportunity for Microsoft to compensate the lack of a own huge Play/App-Store. Just do it!
